attributes.additional_details: The North of England needs a voice in an evermore complicated Union. A devolved North-Parliament on the old Danelaw border, with devolved powers over transport, health and education would help to heal the North/South divide.

rejection.details:
Please see below petition:

Petition Title: The North says "No" to an English Parliament

Created by: Duncan Hall

Closing: 30/03/2015
